item.title: PADI Open Water Certification
item.description: A PADI Open Water Certification allows you to dive independently, without direct professional supervision, to a maximum depth of 18 meters (60 feet). On 20th May 2023, I went to Tioman Islands, Malaysia with NUS Dive for my PADI Open Water Certification and here is all you need to know for your certification!
